ingredients: (optional) parmesan cheese, spinach, peppers, tomatoes, etc.
recipe: Grease a baking pan and gently roll out the pizza dough
Prebake the pizza crust until starting to crisp and cooked-through (7-15 min depending on thickness)
(Optional) In a pan, heat olive oil and garlic, then spread onto the pizza dough
Layer on sauce, spinach, cheese(s), and other toppings
Bake for additional 10 min. or as needed
